title: NNVCD RAG Vector Database Configuration
description: Configuration for vectorizing ACLED Nigeria dataset into a Vector Database for RAG

database_choice.justification: Pinecone offers scalable vector search with easy integration for RAG applications; FAISS provides a local fallback for offline or cost-effective processing

data_source.name: ACLED Nigeria Conflict Dataset
data_source.scope: All conflict events in Nigeria from 1997-present

access_credentials.api_key: [TO BE SET SECURELY VIA ENVIRONMENT VARIABLE OR SECRET MANAGER]
access_credentials.environment: [TO BE SET BASED ON DEPLOYMENT REGION]

ingestion_pipeline.step_1: Download and preprocess ACLED dataset from HDX
ingestion_pipeline.step_2: Clean and normalize data fields (handle missing values, standardize dates)
ingestion_pipeline.step_3: Generate embeddings for textual content using primary model, fallback to local model if needed
ingestion_pipeline.step_4: Index vectors and metadata in Pinecone database, fallback to FAISS local index if Pinecone unavailable
ingestion_pipeline.step_5: Validate ingestion with sample queries for data integrity

maintenance.update_frequency: Weekly sync with ACLED data updates
maintenance.pruning_policy: Remove outdated events older than 30 years unless flagged as significant
maintenance.monitoring: Track indexing errors and query performance
